item.description:
Join us for drinks and dinner at P.F. Chang's inside the Natick Collection. This is a popular restaurant with good food and a great atomosphere. Have a relaxing evening meeting friendly and interesting people and enjoying a great dinner!

We will meet in the bar area, then head to the dining room for dinner.

PLEASE NOTE: Date has been changed to Thursday evening. I'm sorry for the confusion. Look forward to seeing you then!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). Call 774 232 0000 if have trouble finding me.
item.name: Drinks and Dinner at P.F. Chang's at the Natick Collection
